title: [Client] Unable to select ward skin in new draft pick.
body:
Hello!
Today I got the Riggle ward in a chest and wanted to test it out. Problem is is that the Ward Skin select is grayed out for me in the new Draft mode.
During Champ Select: https://gyazo.com/08ee3f0d87711c464f435b3185f18f46
During Skin Select: https://gyazo.com/a1b287cf1c7dd72c6b49c287f803edb1

Although I am able to select the skin in the old Champ Select.
Old Select: https://gyazo.com/5ac7ebe74d1ed5a64209ceaafbc22525
The work around that I found is to use the old Champ Select in a custom game to pick my ward skin as it stayed selected in the new draft pick.
(The icon still shows it as the default ward and is grayed out.)

Hope it gets fixed (or if it's known and is disabled for whatever reason let me know) and thank you!
-Dirtdevil

Just chimed in as it is still an issue with me. I have several ward skins (as I have an issue with spending money on League, thanks Rito :P) and I can only occasionally select a different one. The option is usually grey'd out, just like dirtdevil's. It isn't an every game thing, but during an all day session, it will stop me from choosing my ward skin by the end. I've even tried relogging to fix it, and that sometimes won't even fix it. Hope it can be fixed soon!
Would just like to point out that this happens with me as well, and it's not with any particular ward skin. This also occurs with my friend, and he only has one ward skin.
Yeah. This keeps happening to me, too. I keep wanting to change my wards to match my outfits and half of the time I can't. The wars box is completely greyed out and mom selectable.
